mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* Term.insertTerm */ META.TB008( 도메인일련번호, 용어일련번호, 용어명, 용어카멜명, 용어스네이크명, 시스템생성자, 시스템수정자, 시스템생성일, 시스템수정일 ) VALUES ( #{domainSno} :: INTEGER, #{termSno} :: INTEGER, #{termName}, #{termCamelName}, #{termSnakeName}, #{sysCreator}, #{sysCreator}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT /* Term.selectTerm */ 도메인일련번호 AS DOMAIN_SNO, 용어일련번호 AS TERM_SNO, 용어명 AS TERM_NAME, 용어카멜명 AS TERM_CAMEL_NAME, 용어스네이크명 AS TERM_SNAKE_NAME, 시스템생성자 AS SYS_CREATOR, 시스템수정자 AS SYS_MODIFIER, TO_CHAR(시스템생성일, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_CREATED_AT, TO_CHAR(시스템수정일, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MODIFIED_AT FROM META.TB008 WHERE 1 = 1 AND 도메인일련번호 = #{domainSno} :: INTEGER AND 용어일련번호 = #{termSno} :: INTEGER

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT /* Term.selectTermList */ 도메인일련번호 AS DOMAIN_SNO, 용어일련번호 AS TERM_SNO, 용어명 AS TERM_NAME, 용어카멜명 AS TERM_CAMEL_NAME, 용어스네이크명 AS TERM_SNAKE_NAME, 시스템생성자 AS SYS_CREATOR, 시스템수정자 AS SYS_MODIFIER, TO_CHAR(시스템생성일, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_CREATED_AT, TO_CHAR(시스템수정일, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MODIFIED_AT, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM META.TB008 WHERE 1 = 1
AND 도메인일련번호 = #{domainSno} :: INTEGER
AND 용어일련번호 = #{termSno} :: INTEGER
AND 용어명 LIKE '%'||#{termName}||'%'

AND 용어스네이크명 LIKE '%'||#{termSnakeName}||'%'
) FROM META.TB008 WHERE 1 = 1
AND 도메인일련번호 = #{domainSno} :: INTEGER
